item.title: @elonmusk: "Having kids means you will do anything to ensure that they live and are happy, for you love them mo...
item.description: "Having kids means you will do anything to ensure that they live and are happy, for you love them more than your own life a thousand times over." ä¸€ Elon Musk

item.title: @elonmusk: This is true. Every time I visited Elon, his kids were with him. They spend time together, just bein...
item.description: This is true. Every time I visited Elon, his kids were with him. They spend time together, just being a family. It is not only at home. He also brings his kids with him to work sometimes so he can spend more time with them. Even during his meeting with Prime Minister Modi, his kids were with him. That says a lot about his priorities. He makes space for family time even with a busy schedule. He is a great father. But the media often creates stories and narratives about him that do not match reality. Do not believe everything you see in the news. A lot of coverage is driven by negativity, clicks, and attention rather than truth.

item.title: @elonmusk: This is literally true. Editing Wikipedia was a major for-credit assignment in a Berkeley "Studies" ...
item.description: This is literally true. Editing Wikipedia was a major for-credit assignment in a Berkeley "Studies" course. As a Wokist might say: "Don't automatically assume you're just imagining things."

item.title: @elonmusk: Wilberforce, and people like him, ended the global slave trade that had existed for several thousand...
item.description: Wilberforce, and people like him, ended the global slave trade that had existed for several thousand years. They didnâ€™t invent it, but they did stop it. I should say almost entirely. There are still remnants of it in some parts of the world.

item.title: @elonmusk: I remember when@JohnCleesewas a devout Liberal Democrat. He declined a peerage, which was a pity bec...
item.description: I remember when@JohnCleesewas a devout Liberal Democrat. He declined a peerage, which was a pity because he'd have been a formidable presence in the House of Lords. His political journey is fascinating. Indeed, it merits a doctoral thesis (which I'd be happy to supervise).

item.title: @elonmusk: If black and brown people can be proud of their races, why not whites? If black and brown people can...
item.description: If black and brown people can be proud of their races, why not whites? If black and brown people can be indigenous and native, why not whites? Itâ€™s this lack of symmetry and equality thatâ€™s driving current resentments on all sides.

item.title: @elonmusk: 2-year-old Jeremy Poou-Caceres was shot and killed while walking with his mother. Authorities say an...
item.description: 2-year-old Jeremy Poou-Caceres was shot and killed while walking with his mother. Authorities say an illegal immigrant from El Salvador â€” who already had a deportation order â€” was responsible for the shooting. His face hasnâ€™t been everywhere. There were no marches, no nonstop headlines, no nationwide outrage for this little boy. His life mattered, even if the outrage never came.
